meanings.definition: The quality or state of being untruthful.
meanings.sent1: Her constant untruthfulnesses made it hard to trust her.
meanings.sent2: The untruthfulnesses of the politician were exposed during the investigation.
meanings.sent3: Despite his untruthfulnesses, he always managed to convince others of his innocence.
meanings.sent4: The untruthfulnesses in her words were like a dark cloud hanging over the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The untruthfulnesses in his actions left a lasting impact on those around him.

meanings.definition: The act of being dishonest or deceitful.
meanings.sent1: The untruthfulnesses of the scammer were finally revealed.
meanings.sent2: She was caught in her untruthfulnesses and had to face the consequences.
meanings.sent3: His untruthfulnesses were so blatant that even a child could see through them.
meanings.sent4: The untruthfulnesses of the situation were like a tangled web of lies.
meanings.sent5: The untruthfulnesses of his excuses only made the situation worse.
